job_details.degree_required: Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or equivalent field

jd: From: sangya kumari nahak, adventa sangya@adventatech.com Reply to: sangya@adventatech.com Title: Full Stack Java Developer (Backend Focus) – HybridLocation : Chicago, IL (Relocation Accepted)Duration: 6+ Months (Contract to Hire)Visa: USC or GC with passport copies Interview Process: VideoExperience: 8+ yearsIndustry Background: Aviation or similar 24/7 operations preferred Need:Need DL/Visa Copies with Passport copyFull Education with YearLinkedIn profile with Photo is Mandatory (LinkedIn must be made before or in 2021) Must-Have Skills:JavaSpring FrameworkAngularResponsibilities:Develop web applications that are engaging and user-friendly, focusing on responsive design and cross-browser compatibility.Collaborate with design and implementation teams to create web solutions, including portals and mobile functionalities.Work within an Agile/Scrum framework, ensuring high-quality outcomes in a dynamic environment.Provide guidance on industry best practices for web development, focusing on SEO and page optimization.Collaborate with Quality Assurance to ensure the final product meets quality standards.Conduct benefit analyses for IT solutions and recommend technology directions.Stay updated on industry trends and new technologies, and supervise/direct assigned staff.Participate in recruiting and performance reviews as needed.Qualifications/Education:Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or equivalent field.Technical Requirements:Programming Languages: Java 17, J2EE, Spring Boot 3+, jQuery, JavaScript, Node.js 9.5, Angular 17+ORM Framework: HibernateApplication Servers: WebSphere, WebLogicMessaging Platforms: MQ, EMSAWS experience: A plusAdditional Expertise:Responsive web design and fluid layoutsCross-browser behavior and compatibilitySEO concepts and implementationSource control systems (Git, SVN, TFS)Rapid prototyping skillsUnit testing using established frameworks
